sentences.en: ...and the striker scored his sixth goal of the season.
sentences.cn: …这位前锋进了他本赛季的第6个球。

sentences.en: A predatory striker who plays off the shoulders of the last defender.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉灵敏的射手,擅于突破最后一名后卫的防守.

sentences.en: After the game the striker gave an interview to Sky.
sentences.cn: 赛后,终结者亚昆塔接受了天空体育的采访.

sentences.en: Align each latch and striker so that the striker enters latch squarely.
sentences.cn: 对齐每个锁闩和差速锁闩眼,使得差速锁闩眼直接地进入锁闩.

sentences.en: Arsenal have just signed a new striker.
sentences.cn: 阿塞纳尔队刚雇用了一名新前锋.

sentences.en: From the start of the season, the Arsenal striker has been hounded by the press.
sentences.cn: 从本赛季甫一开始，这位阿森纳队的前锋就不停地遭到媒体的骚扰。

sentences.en: Let's say a right - footed striker always shoots to the right.
sentences.cn: 假设一位右脚型射手总是向右射.

sentences.en: Oliva is the key man in the midfield and the striker.
sentences.cn: 奥利瓦是中场核心和射手.

sentences.en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentences.cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentences.en: The 28-year-old striker was in court last week for breaking a rival player's jaw.
sentences.cn: 那名28岁的前锋因造成对方一名球员下颌骨折，上周出庭受审。

sentences.en: The Arsenal striker remains jauntily confident.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳队的前锋仍旧信心十足，精力充沛。

sentences.en: The new striker failed to make an immediate impression on the team.
sentences.cn: 新的足球前锋没能立即为球队发挥作用.

sentences.en: The striker had / took a shot at goal , ie tried to score.
The striker was unable to find his scoring touch.
sentences.cn: 那个前锋找不到进球的感觉。

sentences.en: The striker's rich vein of form this season has seen him net 32 goals.
sentences.cn: 这位前锋本赛季状态奇佳，进球已达到32个。

sentences.en: Yes. Norbert is the point man in the midfield and the striker.
sentences.cn: 是的,诺伯特是中场核心人物和射手.

words.tran_cn: 因罢工而停顿的，因罢工而歇业的
显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的
罢工，打，打击（strike的过去式和过去分词）
打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透
打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达
罢工者；打击者；[军]撞针；钟锤；叉鱼的人

trans.tran_cn: 罢工者，打击者，打手，（足球的）前锋，锤，报点时钟
trans.tran_en: a player in football whose main job is to score  goals
